body.name: Dyonery Queen 14 Inch Memory Foam Mattress in a Box, Cooling Knit Fabric Cover, Copper-Gel Memory Foam, Made in USA, CertiPUR-US Certified, Firm Fiberglass Free Mattress, 80”x60”, Black
features: Cooling Knit Fabric Cover:Cooling Knit Fabric Cover can create a cooling sensation keeping you comfortable while you sleep.The fabric is smooth and comfortable, absorbent,and allows sweat to evaporate easily, keeping your skin dry.This allows you and your family to enjoy a comfortable.This fabric stays cool-to-the-touch due to its superior breathability and temperature regulating properties that move heat away from the body.

2-layer memory foam mattress:Copper gel memory foam mattress can help you get a good night’s sleep by cradling your body in comfort, reducing tossing and turning, and minimizing common sleep disruptions that can result from uncomfortable pressure points or inadequate support.Whether you’re a light sleeper or a restless toss-and-turner,a high-quality three-layer memory foam mattress can help you achieve a more restful and rejuvenating sleep experience.

CertiPUR-US & Oeko-Tex Standard 100 Certified: Our mattresses are certified by both CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex Standard 100, ensuring that they are free from harmful substances. The memory foam and fabrics have been independently evaluated to comply with all mandatory and voluntary safety standards for mattress products.

Easy Setup：Our mattresses are easy to setup. They can fit all types of frames, including box springs, floors, adjustable beds, foundations, slatted platforms, and flat platforms. Simply wait for 12 hours for the mattress to fully expand to its original shape.

10-Year Limited Warranty for Worry-Free Sleep: We are dedicated to providing you with the best night's sleep possible through our superior products. If there are any issues with your mattress, please contact our customer support team and they will assist you in resolving the problem. Please note that our mattresses cannot be returned once opened.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sponge Bed Square Mattress
reviews.reviewText: I have never slept on memory foam before, because I was imagining sleeping on a giant cleaning sponge. That did not seem appealing to me at all. Also, some of the other memory foam products I have used, smelled unpleasant even after letting them air out and treating them with deodorizers. I have tried many memory foam pillows and seat cushions. Fortunately, this is not the case with this mattress. It does not feel like a giant sponge and smell terrible. The cooling effect is only temporary, because your body warms up the mattress gradually as you sleep. I found that rolling over every once and awhile it become cool again if you move some, which I do. If you like soft mattresses that you sink into, this is great. If you like firm mattresses, then this is not so great. Unfortunately, I wish the mattress to be more firm. Don't get me wrong, I have had some of the greatest sleep ever on this mattress. It does a great job of relieving pressure throughout my body, so I can relax, maybe a little to well. The size of the mattress fits perfectly for my bed. Also, it's definitely a very high quality material that hasn't shown any signs of wear after a month. This seems like it will last longer than old box spring mattress if it's cared for. To me, that makes it worth the money you spend if it lasts. I haven't experience any real issues with this at all, so I'm going to give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewText: Very nice bed, alot firmer than just a medium-firm like the description said, but i like it regardless. Only took couple of hours to restore its self once unpackaged, when you have a fan blowing on it. Beware, very heavy box thou.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solved my back pain
reviews.reviewText: Had a minor back injury from lifting too many heavy objects. After massage therapy the pain was still there. I got this bed bc it is firm and gives the back support I needed. The pain has vanished at night and can work regularly. Thank you tons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, firm mattress
reviews.reviewText: The Twin 10 Inch Memory Foam Mattress in a Box, infused with Cooling Copper Gel, is a game-changer in the realm of sleep technology, particularly for those dealing with back pain. The mattress's innovative design combines the pressure-relieving benefits of memory foam with the cooling properties of copper gel, creating a comfortable and supportive sleep surface. The 10-inch thickness provides just the right amount of cushioning for a restful night's sleep without compromising on support. The memory foam conforms to the body's contours, alleviating pressure points and promoting spinal alignment, making it an excellent choice for individuals experiencing back pain. The added cooling copper gel ensures a temperature-regulated sleep environment, ideal for those who tend to sleep hot. The convenience of a mattress in a box allows for easy transportation and setup. Overall, this Twin Memory Foam Mattress is a thoughtful solution for a comfortable and pain-free sleep experience, merging cutting-edge technology with a commitment to optimal rest and relaxation.
